# Overall Structure

```{r overall}
# Read the text file into a dataframe
email_df <- read.table("email-Eu-core.txt", header = FALSE, sep = " ")

# Name the columns for clarity (e.g., "From" and "To")
colnames(email_df) <- c("From", "To")

# Display the first few rows to verify
#head(email_df)

# Find duplicated rows (including the first occurrence)
duplicate_edges <- email_df[duplicated(email_df) | duplicated(email_df, fromLast = TRUE), ]

# Count the number of times each edge appears
edge_counts <- table(email_df$From, email_df$To)

# Convert to a dataframe for easier inspection
edge_counts_df <- as.data.frame.table(edge_counts, responseName = "Count")

# Filter for edges with more than one occurrence
multiple_edges <- edge_counts_df[edge_counts_df$Count > 1, ]

# Display the results
print(multiple_edges)
head(multiple_edges)
```
